titles.title: Coding Technology Improvements Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to support innovative technology partnerships.
Coding Technology Improvements Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Development.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
Coding Technology Improvements Act
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to expand the Improvement of Postsecondary Education (FIPSE) program to include grants that support innovative technology partnerships.
